video_prompt: Flowers blooming and wilting along a stone passageway. Light shifts, revealing vibrant hues on expanding and contracting floral canopies. Shadows lengthen and recede as the depth of the tunnel fluctuates.
image_prompt: Vertical shot of a magical stone tunnel overflowing with vibrant, colorful flowers (red, blue, yellow, purple, pink). Flowers cascade from above and grow from the walls and ground. A bright blue sky is visible at the end of the flower-lined corridor, with soft light illuminating the scene and creating depth.
refined_video_prompt: Floral canopies dynamically bloom, then wilt, petals expanding and contracting. Light intensely shifts, altering the vibrant hues of the flora. Shadows actively lengthen and recede, causing the stone passageway's perceived depth to fluctuate.
